title: wine_Fallbrook_2012_33_Degrees_North_BDX_Gracie_Hill_Vineyard_Red_(South_Coast)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 5738.
country: US.
description: This winery is one of the region's bright spots, in this case offering expertly layered touches of vanilla, caramel, cappuccino, blueberry and a touch of oregano in the blend of 42% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot, 13% Cabernet Franc, 8% Malbec and 7% Petit Verdot. Cocoa nibs, coffee, black cherry, dill, bay leaf and black olive pop on the palate, where the lingering acidity ensures aging potential..
designation: 33 Degrees North BDX Gracie Hill Vineyard.
points: 90.
price: 33.0.
province: California.
region_1: South Coast.
region_2: South Coast.
taster_name: Matt Kettmann.
taster_twitter_handle: @mattkettmann.
title: Fallbrook 2012 33 Degrees North BDX Gracie Hill Vineyard Red (South Coast).
variety: Bordeaux-style Red Blend.
winery: Fallbrook.
